collection.name: Tangle
collection.openText: Lower my hair, so I can escape from this hell.

specialTipSize.specialTip: When the Instinct work result was Good, the Qliphoth Counter decreased with a very low probability.
When the Attachment work result was Good, the Qliphoth Counter decreased with a very low probability.
When Repression work was committed, the Qliphoth Counter decreased.

When Qliphoth counter of $0 reached zero, she attacked the staff in the containment chamber and attempted to escape. However, regardless of the employee's victory or defeat, $0 did not escape from her chamber.
